detail.name: 2025 Digital Planner with Apple Calendar Integration and Event Import
detail.summary: Thank you for your support‚ÄîI really appreciate that you found value in my work! :)
detail.description_html:
Introducing the Discover Notes Integrated Series Digital Planner, now available for 2025

Create events, set reminders and alarms, start timers, chat with ChatGPT, and open essential apps like Weather and Files all directly from your PDF planner!

Introducing a breakthrough in synchronisation - import events! With a tap of a button you can view your events and paste it directly into your schedule with it time-blocked perfectly.

Make 2025 yours with a copy of the most advanced digital planner to date - 2025 Digital Planner by Discover Notes.

Take the effectiveness of digital planning to the next level by syncing your planner with Calendar (manually both ways via event import and export) and Reminders to receive those vital notifications to help you stay on track. Take your productivity to the next level with quick access to ChatGPT, set timers and alarms directly from the PDF, and open apps like Mail directly so you never get distracted from leaving the app.

Monday start version included. Sunday start update coming soon.

Hyperlinked/Integrated Features:

  • Apple Reminders
  • Apple Calendar
  • Apple Books
  • Apple Notes
  • Apple Files
  • Apple Mail
  • ChatGPT
  • Weather
  • Clock

Experimental Feature - Import Calendar!

A breakthrough in digital planning - the first of its kind! The action gathers your calendar events for the day, neatly organises it into a notification preview, then organises it by the 24 hour schedule which you can paste into the app! Currently optimised for portrait mode, current day, and one hour non-overlapping events.

Frequently Asked Questions

What devices are compatible?

Compatible with Apple devices. Tested on iPadOS 18 and MacOS 15. Suitable for Goodnotes, Notability, OneNote, Noteful, CollaNote, and Noteshelf (or any other note-taking app that supports hyperlinks!).

How does it work?

The PDF contains hyperlinks that link directly to apps and run a Siri Shortcuts action. This allows you to create events, import items, chat with ChatGPT and open other apps.

Is there student discount available?

Yes! Reach out via email with details about your institution and I'll send you a discount code!

Other questions or issues?

Contact us at discovernotesco@gmail.com or over on X (@discovernotesco) and I'll get back to you as soon as possible!

Personal use only. Please note that depending on the app used there may be additional steps. Siri Shortcuts app required.

detail.description_html:
Free Monthly Planner 2025

This Free hyperlinked 2025 monthly planner comes with 13 tabs, 12 month calendar, 2025 year calendar and grid note paper. It works with any PDF annotation apps such as Goodnotes and Notability. Landscape/Monday start. Enjoy! üòä

You can also come back for the full version of 2025 Portrait Digital Planners soon!

2025 Digital Planner Landscape Bundle: https://upliftingplanner.etsy.com/listing/1818442290

Undated planners: https://bit.ly/UndatedAllInOneDigitalPlanner

Full Version 2025 Planners

The minimalist 2025 all in one premium digital planner is perfect for those who want to keep their life more organized by storing all in one place. The dated Yearly Monthly Weekly Daily Planner pages are fully hyperlinked for easy navigation. Plus, this digital planner comes with 6 weekly options, 3 daily options, custom notebook, goal/project sections with 48+ page templates and free digital stickers.

Shop 2025 Full Version Planners


WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE
------------------------------------

‚Ä¢ 1 User Guide with download buttons
‚Ä¢ 108 Fully Hyperlinked 2025 Planner PDFs (White/Offwhite/Dark Mode, Monday & Sunday start)
- 636 pages + 21 covers
- 365 Daily pages + 52 Weekly pages + 52 Weekly Plan & Review + 12 Monthly Calendars 12 Monthly Vision Boards + 12 Monthly Check in + 12 Monthly Finance + 6 Yearly pages + 1 yearly Calendar
- 12 note templates (Lined, Dotted, Grid, Blank, Half-lined, Cornell, List)
- 48 Life Templates including Gratitude and Manifestation templates
‚Ä¢ Essential Digital Planner Sticker Pack (5 colors, 1180 Individual PNG Stickers + 1 Goodnotes Sticker book)
‚Ä¢ 2025 Mini Monthly Calendar Sticker Pack (White/Dark Gray, Sun/Mon, 81 Individual PNG Stickers + Goodnotes Sticker file)


‚Ä¢ IMPORTANT NOTE
This product is a digital planner .pdf file that you can jump page to page thanks to the hyperlinks. This planner must be used with a note-annotating app (not included) such as:
- GoodNotes 5, 6(iPad)
- Notability (iPad)
- CollaNote (iPad)
- Defter Notes (iPad)
- Noteful (iPad)
- ZoomNotes (iPad)
- Noteshelf (iPad and Android)
- Xodo (iPad and Android)

It works on iPad/tablets with an Apple pencil or stylus. Also please be aware of that it is not suitable for mobile phones nor for printing.

------------------------------------
HOW TO DOWNLOAD
------------------------------------

1. Purchase the item and you will immediately be taken to the download button.
2. Click the button to download a PDF that contains all the file links.
3. After downloading the download sheet, please select the weekly and daily combination and choose Monday or Sunday Button to download.
4. Download directly on your iPad, or Import into iPad via Airdrop, Dropbox, Google drive, iCloud.

------------------------------------
PLEASE NOTE
------------------------------------

‚Ä¢ All products here are an instant digital download files. No physical item will be shipped.

‚Ä¢ All sales are final - due to the nature of digital files, once purchased no refunds or cancellations can be offered (you will receive an instant PDF/PNG files to download).

‚Ä¢ This product has been created to be used with an accompanying note-taking app (such as GoodNotes or Notability) and on an iPad/Tablet with an Apple Pencil/Stylus. The PDF files can be also opened on any PDF friendly app or printed on your printer to use as physical paper journals.

‚Ä¢ All of the files are original and copyright to ¬© Uplifting Planner.

‚Ä¢ PERSONAL USE ONLY. This purchase is strictly for non-commercial, personal use only. You may not resell, reproduce, distribute by electronic means or profit in any way from this design. By purchasing this product, you agree to my shop policies.

‚Ä¢ Please don‚Äôt hesitate to get in touch with me with any questions. upliftingplanner@gmail.com

Whether you‚Äôre a student, professional, or creative, this planner + sticker bundle will transform the way you stay organized and inspired.

    • Education: Study Planner, Grade Tracker, Research Notes

    • Household: Chore Chart, Meal Planner, Family Calendar
    • Work: Projects, Meetings, Brainstorming, Contacts

  • Free Yearly Updates to keep your planner fresh

detail.description_html:
The Ultimate 2025 Digital Planner is your go-to resource, designed specifically for iPad users looking to excel with GoodNotes Templates and GoodNotes Planners. Crafted for those ready to achieve clarity, productivity, and organization, this planner features over 170 unique templates and billions of customization options to meet every need for the year ahead.

üóìÔ∏è Daily Inspiration with GoodNotes Templates:

Start every day with purpose using GoodNotes Planners built for daily structure and flexibility:

  • ‚è∞ 24-Hour Daily Schedule
  • üßò ADHD Wellness Trackers
  • üìù Daily Meeting Notes
  • üìä Daily Square Grid
    Whether for meetings, personal tasks, or wellness, these templates keep you on track day by day.

üî• Weekly Clarity for Consistent Progress:

Stay on top of your weekly goals with templates made for comprehensive tracking:

  • üìÖ 2-Page Weekly Planner
  • ‚úÖ Weekly Goals & Priorities
  • üíµ Income/Expense Tracker From to-dos to budgeting, these GoodNotes Planners ensure clarity and organization each week.

üé® Personalized Tabs for Customized Planning:

Use this 2025 GoodNotes Planner to create sections tailored to your needs:

  • üìã Client Profile & Board
  • üìö Book Notes
  • üìù To-Do Lists Whether for professional projects or personal hobbies, every section can be adapted for complete flexibility.

üìà Project Management Mastery:

Master your projects with efficient planning tools:

  • üóÇÔ∏è Kanban Boards & Timelines
  • üí∞ Project Budgeting & Planning Designed to streamline each project, these GoodNotes Templates help you stay organized and goal-oriented.

ü•á Goals & Productivity for 2025:

Accomplish your yearly goals with productivity-enhancing templates:

  • üìà Professional Growth Plans
  • üß© GTD Review & Priority Matrix
  • üìä Habit Tracker & Checklists Get the tools to plan, track, and succeed throughout 2025 with this all-in-one planner.

üí∞ Financial Oversight:

Maintain financial health with budget-focused GoodNotes templates:

  • üí∏ Bi-Weekly Paycheck Budgeting
  • üí≥ Credit Card Ledger & Savings Tracker Stay on top of your finances with templates designed for detailed budgeting and tracking.

üìÜ Monthly & Quarterly Success:

Use monthly and quarterly pages for reflection and planning:

  • üìÜ Monthly Overviews & Action Plans
  • üìã Quarterly Life Check-In With these GoodNotes Planners for 2025, you‚Äôre ready to set goals, adjust plans, and keep progress steady.

üéØ Annual Objectives for a Transformative Year:

Begin and end your year with clear intentions:

  • üåü Yearly Goal Tracker
  • üìÖ Yearly Calendar with Notes Get the year off to a strong start and keep your goals on track for 2025 with these annual templates.

ü•ó Health & Wellness:

Your well-being matters, so we‚Äôve included templates to nurture a healthy lifestyle:

  • üåû Self-Care Checklist & Affirmations
  • üçΩÔ∏è Recipe Trackers & Vision Boards Prioritize your health and happiness with wellness-focused GoodNotes Templates.

üåê All-Around Templates for Every Need:

Explore a variety of templates for all areas of life:

  • üìö Favorite Authors & Reading Reviews
  • üìä Social Media Stats & Planner These templates offer an all-encompassing approach, giving you the tools to plan, track, and reflect across every aspect of life.

Start your 2025 journey with the Ultimate Digital Weight Loss Planner, and enjoy the transformative power of focused, efficient planning with GoodNotes Templates and GoodNotes Planners.
